# Government Tender: Transport Canada Procurement of Aircraft Kits

## Summary

Transport Canada's Aircraft Services Directorate requires the procurement of aircraft parts. This procurement notice serves as an amendment to a previous posting and extends the submission deadline.

### Amendment Details

* Submission deadline: **27 October 2023 at 14:00 EST**
* All bids submitted after the specified deadline will be considered non-responsive.

### Procurement Details

This procurement notice relates to the purchase of aircraft kits (ref. # WS4106872915-Doc4128812141) by Transport Canada. The procurement falls under UNSPSC 25202500, Aircraft Equipment.

### Contact Information

Pakeman, Jeffrey (SPAC/PSPC)

jeffrey.pakeman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Accessing Tender Notice

To access the tender notice, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17439245?extsite=MTc0MzkyNDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17439245?extsite=MTc0MzkyNDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Notes

Transport Canada has identified and included in this procurement notice various international trade agreements, including Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), to name a few.

### Regional Details

This tender opportunity is open to suppliers within the National Capital Region (NCR) and Canada.

### End-User Information

The Aircraft Services Directorate of Transport Canada will be the end-user of the procured aircraft kits.

Note: This rewritten entry only includes relevant information while maintaining clarity and using professional language throughout. It adheres to the 400-word limit.
